accordions.heading: How to start streaming online?
accordions.content: With FastCast4u you can start streaming online in 3 minutes. Sign in, create a package and your Radio Server will be set up automatically, just upload music, broadcasts or shows or connect a live DJ from your computer.

accordions.heading: Earn on streaming online
accordions.content: SHOUTcast Radio Servers come with TargetSpot Stream Monetization program. You can also make money online by placing ad banners on your Web Player Page and activating Admob Ads on Mobile Apps. Lastly, your radio station can rely on Donates from satisfied listeners.

accordions.heading: Web Player Page & Radio Player
accordions.content: Web Player Page will automatically go online with your Radio Server. You don’t need web hosting, complicated website builders or domains - just customize the page and share with your listeners. The customize Radio Player is also available as an embed widget for websites.

accordions.heading: Mobile Apps
accordions.content: Mobile App for Android, iPhone & iPad features a Player for Online Radio and Live TV/Video streams. Your social media and website can be available in a built-in WebView. Using an Online App Creator you get a customized App with your own branding, artwork and theme.

heading.title: Build the Server Package that's right for you in 3 Easy Steps
heading.subtitle: We know what's important for streaming online so all Radio Servers come with:

features.description: Enjoy the Unlimited listener traffic for your online station and Unlimited AutoDJ disc space for audio files

data.heading: Product Delivery time
data.content: Every App is created individually by our App Development Team on be basis of the project you make in Online App Creator. The App delivery time is up to 30 days from the day we receive the project and all required details.

data.heading: Device Compatibility
content: App is supported by Android 9.0 - Pie. It is also backward compatible with older Android builds, up till Android 4.1 JellyBean.
Apple iOS App requires iOS 12.1 and above.

specification.heading: Radio Stream, Live TV and Video
specification.content: The App supports Online Radio Streams (MP3, AAC or AAC+) Live TV Streams (.m3u8) and Video Streams (MP4). You can have multiple streams in one App!

specification.heading: Custom Design
specification.content: Easily design and preview your App with a free Online Mobile App Creator. Next, we create the App individually for your project. All Apps are released free from our branding.

specification.heading: Social Network & Web
specification.content: Share your Social Media Pages and view the content of websites in WebView without any external web browsers.

specification.heading: Podcasts
specification.content: Your broadcasts and shows from SoundCloud are listed and available on demand.

specification.heading: Push Notifications
specification.content: Keep your listeners updated by sending them Push Notifications from an online OneSignal Panel. It’s a great way to notify about your live broadcasts and scheduled shows.

specification.heading: Monetization
specification.content: Make money online on displaying Ads in your App. Ads are delivered by AdMob so you do not have to look for advertisers, we'll just hook up Apps with your AdMob account.

hero.heading: Alexa Skill for your Radio Station

sections.heading: Why create your own Alexa Skill?
sections.content: There are over 100 million Alexa devices sold worldwide and still growing. There’s little doubt that voice control is the future, and Alexa is at the top. Create your own Alexa Skill and let users of Amazon Smart speakers easily tune in to your station.
sections.label: DEMO SKILL

sections.heading: Get your own Skill
sections.content: Get your Skill for Amazon Echo Smart Speakers with a custom voice command.
sections.label: GET NOW

feature.heading: Handy commands to launch your radio
list: Simple activation on Alexa devices by a voice command or through Amazon App
Easily launch and control radio stream with customizable voice commands
Whenever asked, Alexa tells the current track title, artist name or broadcast data

pricing.heading: Alexa Skill Package
list: Compatible with Amazon Echo & Alexa Devices
pricing.label: get now

accordions.heading: How does it work?
accordions.content: Create a unique invocation that will bring up your radio stations on Amazon Echo Speakers (e.g. Alexa, play Top Hits Radio). Just fill-in one simple form to have your Alexa Skill created and published!

accordions.heading: Skill publication
accordions.content: Your Radio Skill will be officially published on the Amazon Store and available for Alexa Echo devices.

accordions.heading: How to create a good invocation?
content: Your invocation name should be two or more words, and can contain only lower-case alphabetic characters, spaces between words, possessive apostrophes (for example, ”sam's online radio”). Abbreviations should be marked as periods, for example, FM is marked as ”f. m.”. All numbers must be spelled out, for example: ”radio twenty one”.

Invocation names cannot contain any of the Alexa launch phrases such as ”launch”, ”ask”, ”tell”, ”open”, ”load”, ”begin”, and ”enable”. Wake words including ”Alexa”, ”Amazon”, ”Echo”, ”Computer”, or the words ”skill” or ”app” are not allowed.

accordions.heading: What languages are supported?
accordions.content: Your Skill can be created in one of following languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Hindi and Japanese.

accordions.heading: Functionalities and voice commands
content: You can ask Alexa to launch your station, by telling her:
Ask about the currently played track title:
